title: Job alert: Chief Veterinary Officer UK

content.text: I hope that my veterinary colleagues will be interested to see that the Chief Veterinary Officer UK job is being advertised.

I plan to retire at the end of February 2018 after almost ten years in post and we hope to have a successor identified in good time. I have had a fantastic time in a challenging and interesting job at the centre of Government, working across the Civil Service and with the private sector, with my CVO colleagues in Scotland, Northern Ireland and Wales, and representing Defra and the UK nationally and internationally. But ten years is a good innings and it is time for me to move on. Do have a look at the advert, assess whether you meet the key criteria and seriously consider applying. It is a great job!
The advert is currently on Civil Service Jobs and further information can be found on the Veredus Recruitment site.
